creature.title: Sally
creature.rules-text: {U}{T}: Tap target creature and pay 1 life.
creature.flavor-text:
Sally doesn't like you.
Or you.

spell.title: Counterspell
spell.flavor-text:
How about "never".
-- Barney of the Green Woods

creature.title: Nightmare
creature.rules-text:
Flying
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
creature.flavor-text: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

creature.title: Blitz Hellion
creature.rules-text:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, Blitz Hellion's owner shuffles it into his or her library.
creature.flavor-text: Alarans commemorated its appearances with new holidays bearing names like the Great Cataclysm and the Fall of Ilson Gate.

creature.title: Barney of the Green Woods
creature.rules-text:
Indestructable, hexproof
{1}{U}{G}, {T}: Every opponent dies in a fire unless all pay {X}{U}{B}{G} or {X}{R}{B}{W} or {X}{X}{B} where X equals your life total.
creature.flavor-text: For the first time in his life, Barney felt warm. And hungry.

land.title: Elysian Brothel
land.rules-text:
Legendary Land
All legendary creatures, gods, and angels, get -1/-1.
land.flavor-text: _They are selective in their clientele, but their service legendary.

creature.title: Sleeping Cherub
creature.flavor-text: Serra's children are angels. And fierce.
